column1: Retrieval-Augmented Generation combines document retrieval with text generation.
RAG reduces hallucinations by grounding responses in retrieved documents.
Natural Language Processing enables machines to understand text.
A vector database stores embeddings for similarity search.
LLMs generate human-like text based on probability distributions.
FAISS is a library for fast vector similarity search.
RAG is widely used in enterprise chatbots.
Summarization condenses long documents into short versions.
